title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in a list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value is set in the list box of the report parameter after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value 'aaa' should remain in the list box after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Check the list box to see if the default value is still 'aaa'.
